New York Giants running back Saquon Barkley  runs the ball against the Arizona Cardinals at State Farm Stadium in Glendale on Sept PERIOD   PERIOD

Theres a chance Giants running back Saquon Barkley could play Thursday night when New York visits the San Francisco 49ers despite spraining his right ankle on Sunday PERIOD

ESPN reported Monday that Barkley would miss three weeks PERIOD Coach Brian Daboll said Tuesday that Barkley will be a gametime decision against the 49ers  PERIOD

 Daboll said PERIOD

Barkley  hurt his right ankle during the Giants gamewinning drive in a  road win over the Arizona Cardinals PERIOD He took a 2yard carry up the middle and appeared to get his ankle caught under Arizona linebacker Krys Barnes with  left in the game PERIOD

Through two games Barkley has rushed for  yards and one touchdown on  carries and caught nine passes for  yards and another score for the Giants  PERIOD

Barkley missed time with ankle injuries in  and  PERIOD His  season was also cut short due to a torn ACL in Week  PERIOD

If Barkley cant play Thursday running back Matt Breida would receive increased playing time PERIOD Breida  carried the ball  times for  yards . yards per carry in  games with the Giants last season PERIOD
